name: FOWL PLAY (NikoViljamiKinnunen)
description:
A bomberman-styled game, about the rivalry between species.

Play alone or with your friend, against some very mean AI!

Can you win a single round?

This game was made as a school project back in 2019.

It uses Unity-engine, and all of the assets are handmade with the help of Millie Cleary.
